participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving but sometimes struggles with motivation.
participant_1.background: I have a lot of fun in my free time, but I struggle to get things done. I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult. I was born male and transitioned to female when I was 17. I love riding roller coasters. I love iced tea.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Cautious yet kind-hearted, enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity. I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature. I enjoy driving my Ford truck to work as a security guard. I like to train dogs. My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.

content.text: Not much. Just got home from work. How about you?
Just hanging out. I'm not really doing anything today.
That's cool. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, ride roller coasters, and drink iced tea.
I like to go to the movies too. I've never been on a roller coaster though.
You should try it! It's really fun.
I'm afraid I'll get too scared.
You don't have to go on a big one. There are some smaller ones that are still fun.
What do you do for work?
It can be. I've had to protect myself from bullies a few times.
That's scary. I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks. I'm just glad I have a supportive family.
That's great. I'm glad you have people who care about you.
